definition: you (used to a superior or between persons of the same generation)/below the foot
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
lit. a thousand mile journey begins with the first step/fig. big accomplishments come from an accumulation of little achievements made one by one
pinyin: qian1 li3 zhi1 xing2 , shi3 yu2 zu2 xia4

sentences.english: Bright spent unsparing hand, foot criticism of grass.
sentences.chinese: 手下留情花似锦，足下留情草如茵。

sentences.english: A thousand mile trip begins with one step.
Discovery begins with a single step.
As the old Chinese proverb says, "A journey of a thousand miles begins with the first step."
sentences.chinese: 像中国的古老谚语所说的，“千里之行始于足下。”

sentences.english: Devotes in the retail chain profession, tour of the great distance, begins under the foot.
sentences.chinese: 致力于零售连锁行业，千里之行，始于足下。

sentences.english: To the blue lotus flower of Mother Syama's feet.
sentences.chinese: 来到了母亲萨雅玛足下的蓝色莲花上。

sentences.english: As the old Chinese saying goes, a journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
sentences.chinese: 中国有句老话，千里之行始于足下。

sentences.english: A journey of a thousand miles begins with single step.
Let me be Your ground, To support Your every step.
sentences.chinese: 我愿是您足下大地，支撑您每一步履。

sentences.english: The journey of a thousand mils begins with taking the walk.
sentences.chinese: 千里之行始于足下，万事总要有一个开头。

sentences.english: There's the old saying everyone's familiar with "a journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step."
sentences.chinese: “千里之行始于足下”这句古谚大家再熟悉不过了。

sentences.english: As Laozi might have said, sometimes the journey of a single step starts with a thousand miles in the opposite direction.
sentences.chinese: 就像老子曾经好像说过的，千里之行，始于足下。

sentences.english: How's your golf game? The answer may tell you a lot about your health.
sentences.chinese: 足下高尔夫球技如何？这可是一个事关你健康的问题。

sentences.english: ‘Every journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.’
As Lao Tzu said, even a journey of 1, 000 miles begins with a single step.
sentences.chinese: 正如老子说的，千里之行，始于足下。

sentences.english: Knowing how greatly interested I am in your progress, allow me to congratulate you on this new honour.
sentences.chinese: 闻足下进步之大，无任允欣，如此新荣，殊堪祝贺。

definition: to float in the air/swiftly/nimbly/easy and relaxed
lit. ten thousand fathoms/fig. extremely high or deep/lofty/bottomless
to tread/to stamp/to step on/to press a pedal/to investigate on the spot
